definition: so as to pass a given point, earlier than the present time, a verb tense that expresses actions or states in the past
details:
adverb
- so as to pass a given point
= example: so as to pass a given point
= synonyms: by
adjective
- earlier than the present time
- of a person who has held and relinquished a position or office
= synonyms: preceding
noun
- a verb tense that expresses actions or states in the past
= synonyms: past tense
- the time that has elapsed
= example: the time that has elapsed
= synonyms: past times, yesteryear
- a earlier period in someone's life (especially one that they have reason to keep secret)
= example: a earlier period in someone's life (especially one that they have reason to keep secret)
